physicalDescription.skinColor: iridescent silver with faint blue undertones
physicalDescription.eyes: large, almond-shaped, glowing white with shifting constellations visible within
physicalDescription.hair: none, but a crown-like array of bioluminescent tendrils extends from the head
physicalDescription.limbs: four arms, each with six jointed fingers, covered in flexible metallic plates
physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: a glowing sigil embedded in the chest, resembling an ancient star map

uniqueTraits.neuralFusion: A symbiotic blend of organic and quantum processors within the brain.
uniqueTraits.regenerativeAbility: Can heal most injuries by converting ambient starlight into cellular repair energy.
uniqueTraits.metabolism: Sustains on cosmic radiation and stardust, requiring no food or water.

biology.communication: Emits a resonant hum that translates into telepathic impressions.

tools.name: Stellar Prism
tools.description: A handheld device that manipulates light and gravity for offense, defense, and utility purposes.

tools.name: Chrono-Weave Mantle
tools.description: A cloak woven from temporal threads, allowing limited time dilation or acceleration.

devices.name: Void Compass
devices.description: A navigation tool that maps paths through dimensions and wormholes.

devices.name: Ethereal Forge
devices.description: A wrist-mounted fabricator capable of constructing tools or weapons from stored matter.

notableEvents: Born during a supernova explosion in the Andromeda galaxy, which granted them an innate connection to cosmic energy.
Led the unification of two warring species, the Luminex and the Obscurai, by forging a peace treaty using a quantum-entangled artifact.
Discovered a dying star harboring an ancient civilization's archive, preserving their knowledge before the star's collapse.
Survived an attack by the Void Reavers, a race of dimension-hopping predators, by outmaneuvering them in a collapsing wormhole.
goals: To uncover the origins of their species, which are shrouded in mystery.
To chart and map uncharted dimensions beyond the observable universe.
To protect endangered civilizations from cosmic threats.
challenges: A fragment of their core sigil is missing, weakening their connection to cosmic energy.
Hunted by the Void Reavers, who seek to harvest their unique biology.
An inner conflict between their organic instincts and cybernetic logic, which sometimes causes indecision.
